name: Grapple Phroggo
description:
Use your tounge to swing yourself up and away from the constantly rising lava!

Controls:

  • Hold to grapple
  • Drag to the left or right to strafe
  • Space to pause
  • Escape for main menu

Background:

This is part of a series where I take inspiration from old games and recreate them combined with a random game mechanic!
